title: Whatever happened to the 60s pop music group The Lettermen? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whatever happened to the 60s pop group The Letterman? Nothing, as they never existed. If by chance you're referring to The Lettermen (Plural, because there are three members), they're still around. The original members are all passed on or retired, but the group as such has stayed intact and has been releasing albums as recently as 2016.

Their music style kind of faded away, along with Kingston Trio, The Limelighters, Chad Mitchell Trio et. al. I think a lot of them may passed, now. I think K.T. is still around performing but with differeny people, none of the originals are alive.
